# Appendix: Full Definitions and Formulae

This appendix enumerates all formulae, thresholds, and default parameters used in combination generation and evaluation.

- Orb sets: {1°, 3°, 5°, 8°}
- Eclipse node proximity: 12°
- Syzygy tithis: 15 (Full), 30 (New)
- Window sizes: {0, ±1, ±3, ±7, ±14, ±30 days}
